dataSet.name: MainQuery
dataSet.query: SELECT BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.Account, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS PeriodTurnoverDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.CurrencyAmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS CurrencyPeriodTurnoverDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS PeriodTurnoverCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.CurrencyAmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS CurrencyPeriodTurnoverCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS TurnoverDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS CurrencyTurnoverDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS TurnoverCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS CurrencyTurnoverCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountOpeningSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS OpeningBalanceDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountOpeningSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS CurrencyOpeningBalanceDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountOpeningSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS OpeningBalanceCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountOpeningSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS CurrencyOpeningBalanceCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountClosingSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS ClosingBalanceDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountClosingSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS CurrencyClosingBalanceDr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountClosingSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS ClosingBalanceCr, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountClosingSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS CurrencyClosingBalanceCr FROM AccountingRegister.Bookkeeping.BalanceAndTurnovers( {(&BeginOfYear)}, {(&EndOfPeriod)}, , , CASE WHEN &ByOffbalance THEN TRUE ELSE (NOT Account.OffBalance) END, , Company = &Company) AS BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear LEFT JOIN AccountingRegister.Bookkeeping.BalanceAndTurnovers( {(&BeginOfPeriod)}, {(&EndOfPeriod)}, , , CASE WHEN &ByOffbalance THEN TRUE ELSE (NOT Account.OffBalance) END, , Company = &Company) AS BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers ON BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.Account = BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.Account

v8:item.v8:content: Only if has turnovers in period
Tylko jeśli są obroty w okresie

dataSet.name: MainQuery

v8:item.v8:content: Currency closing balance cr or null
Currency closing balance dr or null
Currency opening balance cr or null
Currency opening balance dr or null

dataSet.query: SELECT BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.Account, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.ExtDimension1, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.ExtDimension2, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.ExtDimension3, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountOpeningSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS OpeningBalanceDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountOpeningSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS CurrencyOpeningBalanceDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountOpeningSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS OpeningBalanceCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountOpeningSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS CurrencyOpeningBalanceCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS TurnoverDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS CurrencyTurnoverDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS TurnoverCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS CurrencyTurnoverCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountClosingSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS ClosingBalanceDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountClosingSplittedBalanceDr, 0) AS CurrencyClosingBalanceDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.AmountClosingSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS ClosingBalanceCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.CurrencyAmountClosingSplittedBalanceCr, 0) AS CurrencyClosingBalanceCrOrNull, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear.Currency FROM AccountingRegister.Bookkeeping.BalanceAndTurnovers( {(&BeginOfYear)}, {(&EndOfPeriod)}, , , Account IN (&AccountsToTotals) AND CASE WHEN &ByOffbalance THEN TRUE ELSE (NOT Account.OffBalance) END, , Company = &Company) AS BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnoversYear

dataSet.name: SecondQuery

v8:item.v8:content: Currency period turnover cr or null
Currency period turnover dr or null

dataSet.query: SELECT BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.Account, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.ExtDimension1, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.ExtDimension2, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.ExtDimension3, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS PeriodTurnoverDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS PeriodTurnoverCrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.CurrencyAmountTurnoverDr, 0) AS CurrencyPeriodTurnoverDrOrNull, ISNULL(BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.CurrencyAmountTurnoverCr, 0) AS CurrencyPeriodTurnoverCrOrNull, BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers.Currency FROM AccountingRegister.Bookkeeping.Turnovers( {(&BeginOfPeriod)}, {(&EndOfPeriod)}, , Account IN (&AccountsToTotals) AND CASE WHEN &ByOffbalance THEN TRUE ELSE (NOT Account.OffBalance) END, , Company = &Company) AS BookkeepingBalanceAndTurnovers
